course_title: Spec. Topics In Political Science: Global Travel
class_notes:
Travel to Ghana during Spring Break (March 8-17). Permission of Instructor Required.


Instructor will work with students to determine meetings times
course_description: May be repeated for credit when topic varies. Seminar and/or advanced class in selected political science topics. Primarily for students interested in politics.
